Articles.Content:
Damn it all. This is the bug I was talking about, when I launched this ship, this happened:

That's where it spawns. For no reason, at all. Console is vomiting nullrefs but I can't track down WHY it happens...
It's tolerable. I'd probably laugh more than anything, like: "How did they get that thing ALL THE WAY OUT HERE?!"

Okay, finally got an acceptable temperature curve for Jool. You explode around 50 km up depending on how resilient your ship is. The atmosphere overall is higher but I might try to make it lower still. Something like 10km would be ideal...

How would you change that?

I don't even know. These are the temperature curve values right now:

I have absolutely no idea what any of these numbers mean, I just had the game spit out the default ones and tweaked the lower value, they're completely different from anything that the game actually does. It goes to something like -400 in the upper atmosphere then up to several thousand in the lower atmosphere, and I cannot comprehend or consider comprehending why.
Just leave it then, figure it out later. Besides, given Jool's size and comparing it to Jupiter, I think 50km would be semi-realistic.

All right... getting stuff checked over and set up, hoping to release v0.000001 or whatever before christmas is over (I have several hours until it's over in Alaska so I should be good )

If this works well enough upon release, I'm taking a damn break from this. This has been a lot tougher than I anticipated/hoped.

Edited December 26, 2013 by NovaSilisko
May I suggest releasing it at 11:59 PM GMT -12?

May I suggest releasing it at 11:59 PM GMT -12?

Nope! Begin Merry Christmas protocol! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63536-0-23-Alternis-Kerbol-Release-thread-v0-0-Mind-the-bugs

Nope! Begin Merry Christmas protocol! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63536-0-23-Alternis-Kerbol-Release-thread-v0-0-Mind-the-bugs

I just went over and I am downloading right now. can't wait to see how it is!!!
Well I've been looking at your source code and it is MUCH cleaner than mine. Thanks for that.
I just saw the jool-rise. And man it is BRILLIANT.

All numbers are only of a suggestive nature and mainly derive from guessing the radius and the density of the bodies. Therefore other numbers as the actual mass can variate strongly. Since the rotation of non-locked bodies doesn't affect the system and are more or less totally random, I didn't suggested any boundries for them.

For the scale height of the atmosphere I've currently no conclusive idea of how to make it in a good fashion, so it fits the overal shape.

Ideas and constructive criticism are welcome

NICE!!!!!!! Really good job, you did a lot af work checking things out!
I've been trying this out and am really liking the warm lighting. I need to find out how to do this in my other install...
The warm lighting and the dark nights are really awesome. If only they could be on a non-alternis KSP. lol
Is there any new news? Since this thread isn't being used for two weeks...

There is a problem with pol and bop. I tried to go to pol, and everytime I timewarp down below 1200 meter, my ship just explodes. Bop has this in several areas but you could tell it was near where the kraken is.

Is there any new news? Since this thread isn't being used for two weeks...

Are you serious? This mod has it's thread in release section since the last posts were made here.....

here is an idea! Make Eve Bright orange! it would contrast Beutifily! also have moho orbit eve as a moon and move eve closer to Kerbol (about halfway between moho and eve orbits) Plus make eve VERY flat and barren pretty much make it a cloudy desert with small pools of purple liquid as geysers or something. Anyways this mod looks AMAZING! thanks -Ristse
